notFound.heading: No dashboards found
notFound.content: To create a new dashboard click on create

created.content: Dashboard is created successfully. Click on open to create a new view.

delete.question: This will permanently delete the selected {{ name }} dashboard. If you wish to continue type {{ name }} and click on delete.

uniqueError.create: Dashboard already exists with {{param}} name please choose a different name and click on create.
uniqueError.update: Dashboard already exists with {{param}} name please choose a different name and click on save.
